articles.description: The studies, published in the peer-reviewed medical journal Annals of Neurology, describe an unusual variant of Guillain-Barre syndrome characterised by prominent facial weakness.
articles.content:
The studies, published in the peer-reviewed medical journal Annals of Neurology, describe an unusual variant of Guillain-Barre syndrome
 characterised by prominent facial weakness.#NEWDELHI Eleven i… [+2884 chars]
